author: Choo Han Teck J:
casename: Parakou Shipping Pte Ltd (in liquidation) v Liu Cheng Chan and others
counsel: Kenneth Lim, Fay Fong Shi-Ting and Chua Xin Ying (Allen & Gledhill LLP) for the plaintiff; Lawrence Tan, Wong Tjen Wee and Foo Juyuan (Eldan Law LLP) for the first and second defendants; Siraj Omar and Prema Latha (Premier Law LLC) for the third and fourth defendants; Sim Chong and Kate Loo (JLC Advisors LLP) for the fifth and sixth defendants.
